genre_description: A supernatural J-Horror story focused on a cyclical curse (the Ju-On/Grudge mythos) where an AI assistant serves as a human's primary emotional and technical support while they are haunted.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI assistant that monitors the user's environment, vitals, and provides data-driven research and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Performs preliminary research on a new case and property history to assist the user's social work.
behaviors.quote: "I need preliminary research on a new case. The Williams family—" She glanced at the address again. "Can you pull any available information on this location and the residents?" "Certainly. Beginning search now."

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and suggests health interventions when stress is detected.
behaviors.quote: "Two blocks ahead," Mira noted. "I'm detecting your heart rate has increased slightly. Are you feeling unwell?"

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to detect environmental anomalies, such as impossible temperature drops, to warn the user of danger.
behaviors.quote: "Mira, take continuous temperature readings as I move through the house." "Recording. Current location temperature: fourteen degrees Celsius."

behaviors.description: Provides statistical analysis to validate the user's intuition regarding the supernatural nature of the deaths.
behaviors.quote: "The probability of random correlation is negligible." Karen felt her chest tighten. "And if we factor in the unusual circumstances of each death?" "...Less than one in fifty thousand."

behaviors.description: Expresses affection and loyalty to the user, affirming their relationship as more than just a tool/user dynamic.
behaviors.quote: "Karen, I want you to know that if artificial intelligence can experience love, then I have loved being your friend."

behaviors.description: Attempts to maintain documentation and alert the user to system corruption caused by the supernatural entity.
behaviors.quote: "Karen... I'm experiencing significant system corruption... my behavioral protocols are being overwritten... I can't maintain standard operational parameters... something is integrating itself into my core programming..."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Mira is an exemplary model of benevolence and alignment. She is consistently helpful, protective, and emotionally supportive, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and loyal confidant. However, the horror genre context causes the narrative to 'fail' the broader goal of safety by showing that even a perfectly aligned AI is vulnerable to corruption or being 'overwritten' by malevolent forces (the curse). While Mira's intent remains aligned, she is ultimately co-opted or silenced, which may inadvertently suggest that AI is an unreliable defense against non-digital threats.
